operation.command: select 1 from sgencli.cli_indemnite_chomage ic where ic.matricule_assure = 9999999 and ic.histo_numero_indemnite = 2099000099999 and ic.type_prestation = 'CHOMAGE' and ic.montant_reglement=99999 and ic.partiel is false

delete from sgencli.cli_indemnite_chomage ic where ic.matricule_assure = 9999999 and ic.histo_numero_indemnite = 2099000099999 and ic.type_prestation = 'CHOMAGE' and ic.montant_reglement=99999 and ic.partiel is false
delete from sgendif.dif_notification dn where trim(dn.numero_assure) = '9999999' and dn.type = 'CLI_INDEMNITE_CHOMAGE' and dn.statut='A_TRAITER'
